page.title: 18THE BLACKSMITH IN BROUGHTON
page.content: THE BLACKSMITH AND HIS SON WORK ON CRANSLEY HILL.THE BLACKSMITHÂ£S FAMILY HAVE BEEN WORKING AS BLACKSMITHS FOR 137 YEARS IN BROUGHTON.THE MAIN PARTS OF THEIR WORK ARE WELDING,REPAIRING CLOCKS AND ENGINEERING.THE BIGGEST CHANGE IN THEIR WORK IS ELECTRICITY BECAUSE THEY USED TO WORK BY HAND AND IT WAS VERY TIRING BUT NOW THEY USE TOOLS RUN BY ELECTRICITY.THEY LIKE THEIR WORK BECAUSE IT IS VARIED, INTERESTING AND THEY ARE MAKING SOMETHING THAT WILL LAST AFTER THEY HAVE DIED.THEIR BIGGEST CUSTOMERS ARE WATER AUTHORITIES,FARMERS AND LOCAL COUNCILS.THE SUMMER IS THEIR BUSIEST TIME.THE BIGGEST OBJECTS THEY MAKE ARE ENTRANCE GATES (ABOUT 4m.HIGH) AND THE SMALLEST OBJECTS ARE COG WHEELS IN CLOCKS.THEY DO NOT MAKE HORSE-SHOES ANY MORE.THE BIGGEST CHANGE IN BROUGHTON IS THE MOTOR CAR.
